item.title: Wildy safe zone
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

It looks like everything’s okay, so I’m not sure what the problem is, but just a suggestion: since you only have one if-statement at the moment you may as well do this:

public boolean nonWildPvP() { return absX >= 2716 && absX <= 2739 && absY >= 3350 && absY <= 3388 ? true : false; }

Read full topic

item.title: Wildy safe zone
item.dc:creator: @Xx_R_A_G_3_R Xx R A G 3 R
item.description:
@Xx_R_A_G_3_R wrote:

In the 317 client I’m using, cammy area is a safe zone, I want to move this safe zone to Legend’s guild. It’s not working. Here is the code:

unedited: public boolean nonWildPvP() { if (absX >= 3089 && absX <= 3099 && absY >= 3488 && absY <= 3500) { return true; } else { return false; } }

edited with my coords: public boolean nonWildPvP() { if (absX >= 2716 && absX <= 2739 && absY >= 3350 && absY <= 3388) { return true; } else { return false; } }

Read full topic
